"Aki": "Whew, so this is how it is, eh? <%me>, it's going to be okay shortly, thanks."
"When losing your cool, it's most important to rush headlong in. But always bring along your companions."
"My mentor taught me that. He said if you've got cool-headed allies, they'll stop you if you're going too far."
"How many times have I been saved by what my mentor taught me?..."
"...tch, I just can't help talking about him. We completed our goal, let's go home."
